name: Napolitana
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Bianca
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with burro all'aglio(garlic butter), ricotta, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Siciliana
description: Sicilian-style; a thick rectangular deep dish crust topped with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Napolitana Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Bianca Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with burro all'aglio(garlic butter), ricotta, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Siciliana Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Sicilian-style; a thick rectangular deep dish crust topped with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Grandma Pie
description: Long Island-style; a rustic rectangular pan pizza crust, topped with mozzarella fresca, mozzarella, garlic, & stone deck oven baked. Finished with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), basil puree, & parmesan.

name: Margherita Buono
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with mozzarella fresca, olive oil, & stone deck oven baked. Finished with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), & basil puree.

name: Meat Lover
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), pepperoni, sausage, meatballs, bacon, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Vegetarian
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), mushrooms, green bell peppers, onions, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Works
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, green bell peppers, onions, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Baked Ziti
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin round crust topped with sugo di pomodoro(tomato sauce), ricotta, ziti pasta, mozzarella, oregano, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Gluten Free
description: Gluten free-style; a thin, round 12 inch pizza crust that is a combination of gluten free flours & starches like rice flour, almond flour, potato starch, & tapioca starch.

name: Cauliflower
description: Cauliflower-style; a thin, round 10 inch pizza crust that is a gluten-free, low-carb & keto pizza recipe. It's a simple blend of cauliflower, eggs, cheese, & a few spices that's flattened & baked into a golden crust.

name: Calzone
description: Neapolitan-style; an Italian turnover made with leavened dough & folded. Stuffed with mozzarella, ricotta, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Italian
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with salami, capocollo, soppressata, provolone. & stone deck oven baked.

name: Sausage, Onion, & Pepper
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with sausage, onions, green bell peppers, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Meatball
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with meatballs, marinara, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Eggplant
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with breaded eggplant cutlets, marinara, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Chicken
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with breaded chicken cutlets, marinara, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Meat Lover
description: An Italian turnover made with leavened dough & rolled. Stuffed with meatballs, sausage, pepperoni, marinara, mozzarella, & stone deck oven baked.

name: Sausage Roll
description: NYC-style; a blend of sausage, onions, green bell peppers, & mozzarella. Rolled in a light pizza dough. Brushed with garlic herb butter & stone deck oven baked.

name: Garlic Bread
description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter & lightly toasted.

name: Sicilian Garlic Bread
description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter, topped with mozzarella, & lightly toasted.

name: Meatballs & Ricotta
description: Twin Italian style 2oz meatballs accompanied by marinara sauce, ricotta & parmesan.

name: Meatball Sliders
description: Five crostini's topped with our meatballs, marinara sauce, oregenao, & mozzarella.

name: Fries
description: Tossed with salt, black pepper, garlic seasoning, oregano, & parsley.

name: Pepperoni Pizza Fries
description: Bounos-style; seasoned french fries baked with pepperoni, mozzarella, oregano, & finished with marinara sauce.

name: NJ Style Disco Fries
description: New Jersey diner-style; seasoned french fries baked with mozzarella, topped with a classic brown chicken gravy, & parsley.

name: Fried Mushrooms
description: Cremini mushrooms, coated in a light & crispy seasoned batter, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with buttermilk ranch.

name: Fried Zucchini
description: Fresh zucchini sticks, Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with buttermilk ranch.

name: Fried Mozzarella Sticks
description: Six mozzarella sticks, Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with marinara sauce.

name: Fried Ravioli
description: Six ricotta stuffed ravioli, lightly Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with marinara sauce.

name: Traditional Chicken Wings
description: Bone-in fried chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with celery sticks, & choice of dressing.

name: Boneless Chicken Wings
description: Boneless fried chicken pieces tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with celery sticks, & choice of dressing.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, Italian style croutons, caesar dressing, & parmesan.

name: House Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, onions, black olives, oregano, parmesan, & choice of dressing.

name: Chef Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, onions, black olives, banana peppers, provolone, deli ham, oregano, parmesan, & choice of dressing.

name: Chicken Cutlet Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, onions, black olives, mild giardiniera, provolone, salami, cappocolo, oregano, parmesan, & choice of dressing.

name: Antipasto
description: Romaine lettuce, tomatoes, onions, black olives, mild giardiniera, provolone, salami, cappocolo, oregano, parmesan, & choice of dressing.

name: Caprese
description: Mozzarella fresca, vine-ripened tomatoes, olive oil, balsamic fig glaze, basil puree, salt, & pepper.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken cutlets covered with marinara sauce & mozzarella. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Breaded eggplant cutlets covered with marinara sauce & mozzarella. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Lasagna Bolognese
description: A baked six layer Neapolitan style lasagna stacked with bechamel, ground beef, marinara, ricotta, mozzarella, & parmesan. Served with a small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Ravioli Grande
description: Six jumbo ricotta stuffed ravioli topped with marinara sauce, parmesan, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Pasta & Marinara Sauce
description: Choice of pasta topped with marinara sauce, parmesane, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Pasta & Meat Sauce
description: Choice of pasta topped with meat sauce, parmesan, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Pasta & Meatballs
description: Choice of pasta topped with marinara sauce, two jumbo meatballs, parmesan, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Pasta & Saugage
description: Choice of pasta topped with marinara sauce, two sausage links,parmesan, & Italian herbs. Served with a side of pasta, small house salad, & small Italian baguette.

name: Meatball Parmesan
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with meatballs, marinara sauce, mozzarella, oregano, & lightly toasted.

name: Sausage Parmesan
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with suasage links, marinara sauce, mozzarella, oregano, & lightly toasted.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with breaded chicken cutlets, marinara sauce, mozzarella, oregano, & lightly toasted.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with breaded eggplant cutlets, marinara sauce, mozzarella, oregano, & lightly toasted.

name: Sausage, Onions, Peppers
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with sauteed sausage, onions, peppers, oregano, & lightly toasted.

name: Philly Steak
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with sauteed shaved steak, onions, & white wine. Topped with choice of melted cheese, & lightly toasted.

name: Philly Chicken
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with sauteed shaved chicken breast, onions, & white wine. Topped with choice of melted cheese, & lightly toasted.

name: Pepperoni Melt
description: Foot long Italian baguette stuffed with pepperoni, marinara, mozzarella, oregano, & lightly toasted.
